title.rendered: INTECH wins long-term engineering, preventive maintenance, and technical support services contract for one of the world’s largest oil fields in GCC region

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]INTECH has agreed terms to provide engineering, long-term preventive maintenance, and technical support services contract covering Control Systems, Emergency Shutdown systems, and Alarm Management systems for one of the world’s largest oil fields in GCC region. 

Driving the momentum into 2022 from the previous year, which featured highly impactful O&M contract wins in the region, INTECH emerged as a clear winner for this project on the back of its stellar record in global O&M services, strong local presence in the GCC region, and the experience of its O&M team. INTECH’s O&M prowess has become a name synonymous with reliability, excellence of services, and innovative solutions for the most complex automation challenges faced by its customers. 

INTECH’s services will cover seven gas oil separation plants, providing the following services for ESD, Compressor Control Systems, and Alarm Management Systems:  

  • Preventive Maintenance 
  • On-call Maintenance support  
  • Repair and troubleshooting 
  • Site services for firmware upgrades 

INTECH will provide in-house engineering and on-site services for ESD upgrades while the scope of work for Compressor Control Systems and Alarm Management Systems includes provision of required equipment, engineering, testing, documentation, delivery, and on-site services including installation, commissioning, startup support, and site acceptance test for multiple Compressor Control Systems.  

How we are responding to COVID 19: We are ensuring that our services and business agreements are executed to the satisfaction of our clients and partners without exposing anyone to COVID 19. Our factories are operational with significant new safety measures. We have devised a global COVID 19 plan that covers international movement, precautions, behavioral changes, and contingency & emergency response options for all our business regions. 

If you are an INTECH client and have not received information about our business continuity plans, please feel free to reach out to an INTECH account manager or project manager. 

About INTECH’s O&M Solutions 

INTECH’s O&M services provide long-term asset healthcare, maintenance, and upgrades ensuring sustained operation of assets for their planned life and beyond. Our project experiences help us gain valuable knowledge of systems, improving our learning curve in comparison to a third-party O&M provider, thereby reducing O&M risks & costs. With INTECH’s diverse expertise in control systems and oil & gas applications, we also help reduce the hassle of managing multiple vendors for any O&M situation. A single INTECH resource is skilled at handling multiple systems – saving both finances and time. 

For more information visit: https://www.intechww.com/products-and-solutions/operations-and-maintenance/ 

About INTECH 

INTECH Process Automation is a globally renowned system integrator and industrial automation company. For nearly 30 years we have helped major oil & gas companies solve their most pressing issues of instrumentation, control, and electrical automation. INTECH’s diversiﬁed automation solution portfolio, technical skills, knowledge, and expertise on equipment from all major OEMs, and our asset-application speciﬁc approach to solution design are what differentiates us from a typical system integrator. 

As the world moves towards Industry 4.0, we move along with it and since late 2016, we have focused on building up our expertise on Industrial IoT and related digitalization solutions. We are gradually shifting from a project-based solution provider to a partnership-based solution provider. We have started working closely with our technology and platform partners as well as clients to build long-term relationships where we work together to solve problems and provide solutions that are cost-efficient, time-efficient, and bring the best of what everyone can offer. 

For more information, please visit: www.intechww.com [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
